doctors.name: Dr. Prakash das
doctors.qualification: MBBS, MS (Psychology), Sydney College and University
doctors.about: Dr. Prakash Das is a highly experienced psychologist with over 15 years of practice in treating anxiety disorders, depression, and behavioral therapy. He has helped thousands of patients overcome mental health challenges through evidence-based treatment approaches and compassionate care.

doctors.name: Dr. Sarah Johnson
doctors.about: Dr. Sarah Johnson is a renowned cardiologist specializing in interventional cardiology and heart disease prevention. She has performed over 2000 successful cardiac procedures and is known for her patient-centered approach to cardiovascular care.

doctors.name: Dr. Michael Chen
doctors.about: Dr. Michael Chen is a distinguished neurologist with extensive experience in treating stroke, epilepsy, and movement disorders. His research contributions in neuroscience have been published in leading medical journals worldwide.
